original_text: So he came again to Cana in Galilee, where he had made the water wine. And at Capernaum there was an official whose son was ill.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 갈릴리 가나에 이르시니 전에 물로 포도주를 만드신 곳이라 왕의 신하가 있어 그의 아들이 가버나움에서 병들었더니

sentences.original_text: So he came again to Cana in Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 다시 갈릴리 가나에 오셨습니다

sentences.original_text: where he had made the water wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 그가 물을 포도주로 만드셨던 곳입니다

sentences.original_text: And at Capernaum there was an official
